incidents.title: Ransomware Attack on Indian Bank
incidents.description: A major ransomware attack targeted a leading Indian bank, causing downtime of several key services.

incidents.title: Data Breach in Telecom Sector
incidents.description: Sensitive customer data from a large telecom provider was leaked on the dark web following a breach.

incidents.title: Phishing Campaign Targets Government Officials
incidents.description: A phishing campaign aimed at government officials was detected, attempting to steal sensitive login credentials.

incidents.title: Cyber Attack on Major Bank in India
incidents.description: A major bank in India experienced a cyber attack, compromising customer data.

incidents.title: Ransomware Attack Targeting Hospitals
incidents.description: Several hospitals in India were targeted by a ransomware group, disrupting services.

incidents.title: Phishing Scams on the Rise
incidents.description: Authorities warn of increasing phishing scams targeting individuals and businesses.

incidents.title: Data Breach in E-Commerce Platform
incidents.description: A popular e-commerce platform reported a data breach, affecting thousands of customers.
